title: Karma
overview: A fateful accident intertwines six lives in a thrilling tale of karma and crime, where each must face their own dark truths and connections. A hit-and-run. A cover-up. A debt-fueled murder plot. Karma weaves together the fates of six characters, each bound by a single, irreversible moment. The Witness observed a mysterious accident in the dead of night, setting the Unspoken Fate in motion. The Surgeon, haunted by a lifelong trauma, and confronted by the painful past she vowed never to face again. The Debtor & the Outsider, jobless and trapped, plunge headlong into the fate of dark deals. The Doctor & the Alluring Girlfriend, as one fateful mistake on a dark night spirals uncontrollably into a catastrophic accident. Six lives, one inescapable fate.
